key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by unity-settings-daemon or not

key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in unity-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: night-light-enabled
key.summary: If the night light mode is enabled
key.description: Night light mode changes the color temperature of your display when the sun has gone down or at preset times.

key.name: night-light-temperature
key.summary: Temperature of the display when enabled
key.description: This temperature in Kelvin is used to modify the screen tones when night light mode is enabled. Higher values are bluer, lower redder.

key.name: night-light-schedule-automatic
key.description: Calculate the sunrise and sunset times automatically, from the current location.

key.name: night-light-schedule-from
key.description: When “night-light-schedule-automatic” is disabled, use this start time in hours from midnight.

key.name: night-light-schedule-to
key.description: When “night-light-schedule-automatic” is disabled, use this end time in hours from midnight.

key.name: night-light-last-coordinates
key.description: When location services are available this represents the last detected location. The default value is an invalid value to ensure it is always updated at startup.

key.name: night-light-allday
key.description: (intel)At any time, night mode is open.

key.name: theme-schedule-automatic
key.summary: Use the sunrise and sunset to set theme
key.description: (intel)Calculate the sunrise and sunset times, and set the theme automatically.

key.name: night-light-schedule-automatic-from
key.description: (intel)When “night-light-schedule-automatic” is enabled, calculate this start time in hours from midnight.

key.name: night-light-schedule-automatic-to
key.description: (intel)When “night-light-schedule-automatic” is enabled, calculate this end time in hours from midnight.

key.name: style-name-dm
key.summary: Use record theme style,when dark mode is true record the /org/ukui/style's key style-name,when dark mode is false set this value to the style-name.

key.name: night-light-enabled-dm
key.summary: If the night light mode is enabled
key.description: Use record theme style,when dark mode is true record the night-light-enabled,when dark mode is false set this value to it.

key.name: night-light-allday-dm
key.description: Use record theme style,when dark mode is true record the night-light-allday,when dark mode is false set this value to it.

key.name: night-light-schedule-automatic-dm
key.summary: Use the sunrise and sunset to set theme
key.description: Use record theme style,when dark mode is true record the night-light-schedule-automatic,when dark mode is false set this value to it.

key.name: theme-schedule-automatic-dm
key.summary: Use the sunrise and sunset to set theme
key.description: Use record theme style,when dark mode is true record the theme-schedule-automatic,when dark mode is false set this value to it.
